text: Alexander Sergeyevich Lenkov (17 May 1943 - 21 April 2014) was a Russian actor. He was best known for winning the People's Artist of Russia in 1997. He was born Rasskazovo, Tambov Oblast, Russian SFSR, Soviet Union. Lenkov died from a long illness on 21 April 2014 in Moscow, aged 70. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1943 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Disease- related deaths in Russia Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian stage actors Category:Russian television actors
title: Alexander Lenkov
